metadata.title: CVE-2022-0534 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in htmldoc version 1.9.15 where the stackout-of-bounds read takes place in gif_get_code() and occurs when opening amalicious GIF file, which can result in a crash (segmentation fault).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0534` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.7-1ubuntu0.3+esm2
htmldoc-common - 1.9.7-1ubuntu0.3+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.7-1ubuntu0.3+esm2').
